title.rendered: INNOVATIVE BEAUTY PRODUCTS YOU NEED TO TRY

content.rendered:
INNOVATIVE BEAUTY PRODUCTS YOU NEED TO TRY

With better science and technology we are lucky to get new innovative beauty products that reach the holy grail status. Those “How did I live without it?” products. Better skin, better hair, better lashes, and better everything! 

D’Lashes Strip Lashes

Cult status lash extensions pioneered by Dionne Phillips are loved by Victoria Beckham and many other celebrities. Due to popular demand, Dionne created her own line of lashes that are now available to purchase online. Stock up on your favorite lashes here.

Zena Foster High Roller Face and Body Massager – www.zenafoster.com

The High Roller will leave your skin feeling energized and enhanced. CLICK HERE TO SHOP.

Benefits

  • Regular usage of the High Roller on the face and body and helps improve the appearance of skin tone for a more refreshed, healthy and youthful-looking appearance.
  • Rejuvenates facial skin.
  • Helps diminish signs of aging (lines and wrinkles).

Suggested Use

  • Best for face, neck, and hands, but can be used all over your body.
  • Recommended massaging each desired area for up to 30-45 seconds in up and down or left and right motions.
  • Daily use encouraged.

Zena Foster Sonic Gold Beauty Bar

As the vibrating T-shaped bar glides over the skin, it stimulates the tiny blood vessels just under the surface. That helps relieve tension in the area and boost circulation, bringing a rush of skin-boosting nutrients to the area. CLICK HERE TO SHOP.

Benefits

  • Rejuvenates facial skin
  • Helps diminish signs of aging (lines and wrinkles)
  • Safe for use around the eye area

OLAPLEX for Hair

Another innovative product that helps repair and strengthens hair is Olaplex #3 at home treatment. If you have dry damaged hair that breaks easily this product will help get you back to healthy, soft, shiny, and strong hair. It’s a MUST-HAVE!

1: Black blazer sporty look is from FWRD.COM 2: Get celebrity favorite Lash Extensions from D’Lashes. For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). 3: Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 4: Shop Olaplex 5: Beautiful Moschino perfume bottle. 6: New highlighter/glow/sculpt stick by the one and only Chanel that quickly sold out on Nordstrom.com. 7: New D’Lashes long-wearing eyeshadow is here! Shop D’Lashes beauty here.

LOVE DIONNE
